title: Google\Cloud\CertificateManager\V1\CertificateIssuanceConfig
name: CertificateIssuanceConfig
description:
CertificateIssuanceConfig specifies how to issue and manage a certificate.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.certificatemanager.v1.CertificateIssuanceConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: A user-defined name of the certificate issuance config. CertificateIssuanceConfig names must be unique globally and match pattern projects/*/locations/*/certificateIssuanceConfigs/*.

params.name: data.create_time
params.description: Output only. The creation timestamp of a CertificateIssuanceConfig.

params.name: data.update_time
params.description: Output only. The last update timestamp of a CertificateIssuanceConfig.

params.name: data.labels
params.description: Set of labels associated with a CertificateIssuanceConfig.

params.name: data.description
params.description: One or more paragraphs of text description of a CertificateIssuanceConfig.

params.name: data.certificate_authority_config
params.description: Required. The CA that issues the workload certificate. It includes the CA address, type, authentication to CA service, etc.

params.name: data.rotation_window_percentage
params.description: Required. Specifies the percentage of elapsed time of the certificate lifetime to wait before renewing the certificate. Must be a number between 1-99, inclusive.

params.name: data.key_algorithm
params.description: Required. The key algorithm to use when generating the private key.
